intro:
0
10
"YOU ARE IN A DIMLY LIT ROOM.  THE WALLS ARE BARE ROCK WITH STRANGE DESIGNS EN-  GRAVED IN THEM. YOU CAN SEE TORCHLIGHT  TO THE EAST, WHICH IS YOUR ONLY EXIT."
"YOU ARE IN AN EAST/WEST TUNNEL."
"YOU ARE AT A 'T' INTERSECTION. TO THE   EAST AND WEST ARE NARROW TUNNELS. TO THENORTH YOU SEE TORCHLIGHT, BUT CAN'T MAKEOUT ANY DETAILS."
"YOU ARE IN A NARROW EAST/WEST TUNNEL.   THE FLOOR IS COVERED WITH A STRANGE RED SLIPPERY SUBSTANCE. TO THE EAST YOU SEE A ROOM, TO THE WEST IS AN INTERSECTION."
"YOU ARE IN A SMALL ROOM WITH QUARTZ     WALLS.  THE AIR IS HUMID, AND YOU HEAR  HARMONICA MUSIC PLAYING. THE ONLY EXIT  IS TO THE WEST."
"YOU ARE AT A 4-WAY INTERSECTION. TO THE NORTH YOU SMELL FLOWERS. TO THE EAST IS AN ARCHWAY. TO THE WEST YOU CAN SEE WHATAPPEARS TO BE SUNLIGHT. TO THE SOUTH IS AN INTERSECTION."
"YOU ARE IN WHAT APPEARS TO BE A VERY    LARGE DINING HALL. A HUGE TABLE SPANS   THE LENGTH OF THE ROOM. YOU SEE VERY    ANCIENT PAINTINGS ADORNING THE TILE     CEILING. TO THE NORTH YOU SEE A SMALL   CORRIDOR, TO THE EAST A SMALL ROOM."
"YOU ARE IN A SMALL ROOM WITH STONE TILE FLOORS AND SHINY METALLIC COUNTERS WHICHARE BOLTED TO THE FLOOR. THE ONLY EXIT  IS TO THE WEST."
"YOU ARE IN A NORTH / SOUTH CORRIDOR. TO THE SOUTH IS A LARGE DINING HALL, TO THENORTH THE CORRIDOR CONTINUES OUT OF     SIGHT."
"YOU ARE IN A NORTH/SOUTH CORRIDOR. TO   THE EAST AND WEST YOU SEE SMALL ROOMS   WHICH WERE PROBABLY ONCE GUEST ROOMS.   "
"YOU ARE IN A SMALL ROOM WITH LIMESTONE  FLOORS AND MARBLE WALLS. YOU SEE A SMALLROOM TO THE SOUTH, PROBABLY A CLOSET.   THE ONLY EXIT IS TO THE WEST."
"YOU ARE IN A SMALL CLOSET, AND CAN SEE AMYSTICAL INSCRIPTION CARVED INTO THE    STONE WALL.  THE EXIT IS TO THE NORTH."
"YOU ARE IN WHAT WAS PROBABLY ONCE A     GUEST ROOM. THE FLOOR IS COVERED WITH A THIN FILM OF ALGAE. THE WALLS ARE COV-  ERED WITH A DENSE MOSS. THE ONLY EXIT ISTO THE EAST."
"YOU ARE IN A NORTH/SOUTH CORRIDOR. THE  CORRIDOR CONTINUES TO THE NORTH AND THE SOUTH. TO THE EAST YOU SEE A LARGE TUN- NEL WHICH IS DIMLY LIT BY TORCHLIGHT."
"YOU ARE IN A TUNNEL. ALL SIDES OF THE   TUNNEL ARE COMPOSED OF ROUGH ROCK. TO   THE WEST IS A CORRIDOR, TO THE EAST YOU SEE A CHAMBER."
"YOU ARE IN A RATHER LARGE CHAMBER WITH  A SMALL TRICKLE OF WATER FLOWING FROM   A HOLE IN THE WALL. THE WALLS ARE A PALEGREEN COLOR, WITH FLECKS OF SILVER      SPREAD THROUGHOUT. TO THE WEST IS A TUN-NEL, TO THE NORTH THE TUNNEL CONTINUES"
"YOU ARE IN A VERY TIGHT NORTH/SOUTH TUN-NEL. YOU HEAR FAINT HUMMING TO THE NORTH"
"YOU ARE IN A LARGE ROOM WITH SMOOTH,    SHINY BLACK WALLS. YOU CAN HEAR WATER   FLOWING, BUT CAN SEE NO WATER IN THIS   ROOM. EXITS GO IN ALL DIRECTIONS."
"YOU ARE IN A SMALL ROOM WITH A CRUDE    WOODEN FLOOR AND A STONE FIREPLACE WHICHHAS GLOWING ASHES WITHIN. AN INSCRIPTIONON THE WALL SAYS 'KILROY WAS HERE.' THE ONLY EXIT IS TO THE WEST."
"YOU ARE IN A VERY COLD ROOM WHICH IS    PROBABLY USED TO STORE FOOD. YOU SEE    BLOOD STAINS ON THE FLOOR. THE ONLY EXITIS TO THE EAST."
"YOU ARE IN A VERY LARGE ROOM, SO LARGE  THAT YOU CANNOT SEE THE OTHER SIDE.     THERE IS A VERY WIDE AND DEEP CHASM TO  THE NORTH. TO THE SOUTH IS THE ONLY EXIT"
"YOU ARE IN A NORTH/SOUTH CORRIDOR. TO   THE NORTH YOU SEE THE END OF THE COR-   RIDOR. TO THE EAST IS AN ENTRANCE WITH  A SIGN THAT SAYS 'DO NOT ENTER'."
"YOU ARE IN AN ABANDONED ELEVATOR SHAFT. YOU CANNOT SEE THE BOTTOM."
"YOU ARE AT THE NORTH END OF A VERY LONG NORTH SOUTH CORRIDOR. A SIGN ON THE WALLSAYS 'DEAD END'."
"YOU ARE AT THE BOTTOM OF A VERY DEEP PITWHICH HAS STEEP SMOOTH WALLS (YOU CAN'T POSSIBLY CLIMB OUT.) YOU CAN SEE CLEAR  BLUE SKY ABOVE YOU. THE ONLY EXIT IS TO THE EAST."
"YOU ARE IN A GIGANTIC GARDEN WITH THE   VERY WALLS,FLOOR,AND ROOF COVERED WITH  VEGETATION. THE DIFFERENT COLORS OF VEG-ITATION BLEND TOGETHER TO CREATE AN     ALMOST HYPNOTIC EFFECT. THE ONLY EXIT ISTO THE SOUTH."
"BEFORE YOU LIES THE BODY OF THE FENCING MASTER."
"YOU SEE THE BODY OF THE DEAD CHEF."
"YOU SEE THE DEAD BAT."
"YOU SEE THE CYLON ROBOT, ITS RED EYE IS NO LONGER MOVING."
"YOU SEE THE BODY OF A WOMAN."

rooms.name: /S TUNNEL A CLOSET END OF A N/S TUNNE
rooms.description: L THE BOTTOM OF A PITDATA ERROR THE WEST GUEST ROOM
